name: Cardinal Peak
description:
At Cardinal Peak, we provide contract engineering services to technology companies committed to maximizing the ROI on their engineering investments. We offer unsurpassed leadership in Digital Video & Audio and the Internet of Things (IoT).
We can support your team during critical surge periods of development, or deliver complete, end-to-end solutions. We add tremendous value from day one to every project we undertake.
Offering the fastest, most reliable approach to bringing embedded devices and applications to market, Cardinal Peak is the trusted ally of large and midsize technology companies as well as promising start-ups.
